last_episode_to_air.name: Teresa
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rex runs into gangsters and a hurricane while searching for a missing playboy at an island casino.

name: Bourbon Street Beat
overview: Bourbon Street Beat is a private detective series which aired on the ABC network from 1959-1960 and featured Richard Long as Rex Randolph, Andrew Duggan as Cal Calhoun, Van Williams as Kenny Madison, and Arlene Howell as Melody Lee Mercer, the secretary at the New Orleans detective agency in which they worked.
